summary:
"Suspiria" (2018) is a scary movie about an American woman who goes to a dance school in Berlin, Germany. The school is secretly run by witches! Dakota Johnson plays the main character, and Tilda Swinton plays three different roles, including the leader of the witches. 

The movie is based on an older Italian film from 1977 and is set during a tense time in German history. It has beautiful but dark visuals and cool dance scenes. Some people loved it, but others didn't think the story worked.
title: Suspiria (2018 film)
